item.description:
Dear Westborough Spirituality Meetup group members,

How are you doing?
This month, one of our member is going to host a Tao Te Ching discussion. I am honored to tell all of our group members, we are all invited.

What is Tao Te Ching? This is an ancient book from Lao-zi who was a wise man and well-known philosopher. You may or may not know that this is top 3 world wise translated (to different languages) book. Inside has 81 chapter, each chapter is short, but meaning is deep.

Please notice that this time is not in my place, we are going to beach !!! Summer

ReJeana is inviting all of you to her house for Tao Te Ching discussion again on 8/30.
As you know, ReJeana's house is just a few blocks away from the beach. You can enjoy the beach after the discussion.

Here is the information. About the parking, please park your car on her driveway or the lawn in front of the house. Please try not to park on the street.

Date: 08-30-2009 (Sunday)
Time: 1:30 to 2:00 pm: social time
2:00 to 4:00 pm: discussion
4:00 to ???: beach time

Chapter: 7

PS: Car-pool are available
I am going from Westborough to Marshfiled at 12:30pm
If you like car-pool with me, please give me a call, or If you like to offer a car-pool, please call me too
at 617-223-7166

Thank you


Jonathan


About this Meetup Group
item.name: Tao Te Ching discussion
